description: pos should be delisted

An unstable heap of stolen code that the 'developers' involved brute forced and threatened their way to. This junk has done only damage to the emulation community at large. Use the far better real emulators and forget this.

i cant say this will be everyones experience but for me retro arch has always worked butter smooth and almost RTR with all versions of OS and distros ive tried inc arch linux,backtrack linux, the steam deck/steamOS and android on a motorola edge 20 pro (ideally with retroarch on aphone,you need a good lot of memory and a high numbered snap dragon cpu.), i recomend it to anyone but especially those new to emulation,just download the cores you want on the frontend and the rest,is as they say...history.
Might not be the best but sure is easy to setup and gets the job done 5/5.
summary: A great way to start with emulation

description: cannot use hot keys in games
summary: cannot use hot keys in games

description:
pretty much on game mode using emulation station. the hotkeys do not want to work or i cannot save any configurations. 
hope this gets fixed in future patches
summary: can't use hotkeys or save config on game mode

description: its retroarch... you know what you're getting. great for quickly getting all your emulators at once and together. its not a skimped version like the one on steam, can download cores and content through the online updater. my one only complaint is the on-screen keyboard on steam deck isnt recognized, so you cant type in online dreamcast games for example. very specific problem so i cant knock it for that.
not working, crashing at startup
Working perfectly under a fresh install of OpenSuse 15
I've even got retroarch/retropie on a crt in my bedroom that plays the old games and old anime via the xbmc port for retropie, its really sweet.
summary: I play pokemon red in waiting rooms smoothly thanks to retroarch

description: Working like a charm on Fedora 30. Tons of Settings, tons of Cores, playing in NES Tetris and happy like a Lama

First off let me say I appreciate all the work of the ORIGINAL emulator authors. Without them RetroArch wouldn't exist. Next I love how RetroArch wraps everything into one interface. It's a confusing interface, but an interface none the less. With loading the cores then loading the ROMs then starting the emulator it's a bit much for new users. At least there is the Ozone menu driver to make it feel familiar to Nintendo Switch users. Anyway, great package. Thank You.

Takes some time and effort to learn to use this complex emulation environment, but it's really worth it. Once you get the hang of it, everything makes sense and is easy to find and use. It is a big project, no doubt, so take it easy at the beginning - it can be quite frustrating at first. But it will be worth it!

Definitely check out the Android version as well, if you haven't already?️
Works perfectly and performs well on Kubuntu 19.10.
Seems to be working perfectly on Debian 10.
good emulation.
I can play game boy advance. Its works!
summary: Very good to play my computer

description: Simply has literally all platforms you can imagine and integrates with a lot of things - including RetroAchievements

pros: no other emulator does the amount of things this one does	
cons: menus were organized by a mad man and you even find the same options in diferent places with different names
summary: almost perfect but needs a menu revision

description: superb and easy way of getting this great emulator system
if you can't download cores it means you need to update the core info files in the online updater!

Works as intended. The interface can be a little overwhelming for someone who hasn't used it before, but it's fine. I wish there was a gui for save files, though. Having to work with hotkeys is hot garbage.
Has it been updated in the last few days? Or does it depend on the distro after all? It says version 1.9 for me. No problems here, cores can be installed just fine with RetroArch Flatpak.
summary: Installing cores works fine for me

description: I had this on my dying windows computer, and it ran kinda well! sure, it lagged a lot, but that was because i crowded it with a whole bunch of other stuff. It has most systems (Minus PS3 and 4).
summary: Mostly Lightweight Emulator Frontend With most systems

description: RetroArch is the perfect emulator, and dare I say, the perfect console. Combine a controller and/or the mobile Retropad to this app, connect your computer to a TV via HDMI, and you'll get that feel of playing on a console. I love it, really
Emulación de muchas plataformas de manera sencilla.

This may the worst interface ever. Looks to be copying the UI from PS3 etc. Uses terms like "cores" instead of emulators, it is almost like the developers were trying to make it difficult to get this mess set up and running. You are better off creating file associations with emulators and using a file browser to load your roms.
Pantalla oscura no carga menu no carga absolutamente nada
un emulador muy completo y de facil uso
Un muy buen programa... No se puede pedir mas aqui lo encuentro todo.
alguiien me ayuda?

Sinceramente tienes todo tipo de emulador y puedes configurar globalmente muchas cosas, tener tu "arcade" en un mismo lugar es genial, le falta simplificar un poco las opciones, mejorar otras y un poquito la performance pero en general es buenisima, ojala pronto llegue el emu de PS3 andando bien!

me gusta mucho tener diversos emuladores solo en una aplicación, lo mejor que esta misma esta para android, funciona bastante bien, si bien tiene algunos errorsillos en algunas librerias ira mejorando de a poco de seguro. Gran trabajo y muchas gracias!
Si has tenido problemas con que los nucleos no aparecen o no es la version mas reciente utiliza la extencion de flatpak, estara todo configurado y estara en su version mas reciente.
En la versión v1.10.3 en flatpak,appimage etc ya no descarga imagenes espero se actualize porque lleva bastante tiempo sin dar señales.
le flatpak fonctionne pas , écran noir des le lancement d'un jeu
Marche super bien avec flatpak !
summary: Super pour l'emulation il a du choix

description: L'intégration des différents coeurs est excellente. Un must du rétro gaming !

Данный эмулятор RetroArch не запускает игры Nintendo 3DS. При запуске этих игр появляется только черный экран, а затем сам эмулятор выключается. Также нет возможности в самом эмуляторе удалить ненужные ядра.
Поддерживает большинство игровых платформ.
